analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: na hetum na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasukhāya
analyzed: na hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nahetu sukhāya
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca na hetu sukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na hetu na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutta mūlam tīṇi yeva saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi vipākam natthi

original: Nahetuṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca hetu adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
